Recommendations: to maximize the participation of faculty and student in research it is suggest that they should be involve in the formulation of research agenda of the college
encourage all faculty member to be involve in research either individual or team research to develop their passion and culture for research
faculty member may be encourage to conduct action research to improve the content and the delivery of the teachinglearning process
research capability enhancement for faculty and student may be conduct to update them on the current trend in research which include the use of statistical software in the analysis of data
if there is an opportunity encourage all faculty member to present their research output on regional national and international forum or conference
it is suggest that research output may be utilized in instruction and extension activity of the college
